hints: If you have already given Sydney <%=fmtDecimal(totalRow([r3c1, r3c2, r3c3, r3c4]) / 100, 2)%>. How many <%=cellLabel("ten dollar bills", "one dollar bills", "dimes", "pennies", 1)%> would you give Sydney to get <%=fmtDecimal(8237 / 100, 2)%>?
What is the highest number of <%=cellLabel("ten dollar bills", "one dollar bills", "dimes", "pennies", 1)%> you can have without going over <%=fmtDecimal(8237 / 100, 2)%>?
Try entering <%=preferredValue(8237, r3c1, r3c2, r3c3, r3c4, 1)%>
